title: Sick of Platniums picking Blitzcrank
body:
Can we seriously just remove him from the champion pool when you hit a certain elo?

Beside bronze-tards falling for his usual cheese, he is fucking useless in lane and even more pathetic in teamfights. Blitzcrank is a one trick pony, a Warwick in disguise, but people deny that fact becuase "hurr he has [one] skill shot xd hard to play" except he has so much counter-play, the only thing he outplays is himself.

I honestly would much rather have a NIDALEE support over Trollcrank.
